Author: throwaway999424999
Text: Ugh that’s awful. I had the same thing happen to me. I often nap on my lunch break since I don’t eat lunch and one of my friends snapped a pic and sent it to our other friends and then she sent it again months later like it’s not funny I hate that pic.

Author: TheShortGerman
Text: surprise candid pics are the worst  I always look so fucking fat  But what is actually crazy is when I see myself on video, I look as thin as I am in real life. IDK what it is about still life photos that adds 10 lbs but the effect doesn't seem to be there for video
